product_name: REI Doty Socks - Women's - 2012 Special Buy
long_description: Offering casual style and the soft, breathable comfort of merino wool, the REI Doty crew socks are sure to earn themselves a prime spot in your sock drawer. REI Doty sock bottoms are padded with lightweight terry; legs and tops of feet are a slim flat-knit. Merino wool naturally regulates temperature in any climate, wicks moisture and resists odors`. Nylon provides durability; Lycra(R) spandex provides stretch to improve fit. Flat toe seams prevent chafing; machine washable. Special Buy.
short_description: Offering casual style and the soft, breathable comfort of merino wool, the REI Doty crew socks are sure to earn themselves a prime spot in your sock drawer.
